db.sql: CREATE TABLE sys_var ( name text PRIMARY KEY, value text )
CREATE TABLE propertyclassification ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, state TEXT, code TEXT, name TEXT, special NUMERIC, orderno NUMERIC )
CREATE TABLE bldgkind ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, state TEXT, code TEXT, name TEXT )
CREATE TABLE machine ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, state TEXT, code TEXT, name TEXT )
CREATE TABLE material ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, state TEXT, code TEXT, name TEXT )
CREATE TABLE miscitem ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, state TEXT, code TEXT, name TEXT )
CREATE TABLE parameter ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, state TEXT, name TEXT, caption TEXT, description TEXT, paramtype TEXT, minvalue REAL, maxvalue REAL )
CREATE TABLE planttree ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, state TEXT, code TEXT, name TEXT )
CREATE TABLE structure ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, state TEXT, code TEXT, name TEXT, indexno NUMERIC )
CREATE TABLE landrysetting ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, state TEXT, ry NUMERIC, appliedto TEXT, previd TEXT )
CREATE TABLE landassesslevel ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, landrysettingid TEXT, classification_objid TEXT, code TEXT, name TEXT, fixrate NUMERIC, rate REAL, previd TEXT )
CREATE TABLE landassesslevelrange ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, landassesslevelid TEXT, landrysettingid TEXT, mvfrom REAL, mvto REAL, rate REAL )
CREATE TABLE lcuvspecificclass ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, landrysettingid TEXT, classification_objid TEXT, code TEXT, name TEXT, areatype TEXT, previd TEXT )
CREATE TABLE lcuvsubclass ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, specificclass_objid TEXT, landrysettingid TEXT, code TEXT, name TEXT, unitvalue REAL, previd TEXT )
CREATE TABLE lcuvstripping ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, landrysettingid TEXT, classification_objid TEXT, striplevel NUMERIC, rate REAL, previd TEXT )
CREATE TABLE landadjustmenttype ( objid TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, landrysettingid TEXT, code TEXT, name TEXT, expr TEXT, appliedto TEXT, previd TEXT, idx NUMERIC )
